title: Counter-Strike 2
desc: Immerse yourself in intense tactical warfare with this first-person shooter from Valve, where teamwork and strategy reign supreme.

title: Minecraft
desc: Dive into a sandbox adventure like no other, where creativity knows no bounds in this world-building game by Microsoft.

title: Valorant
desc: Experience high-stakes, tactical shooter action in this competitive game by Riot Games, combining precise gunplay and unique agent abilities.

title: Baldur's Gate III
desc: Embark on an epic journey in this role-playing game from Larian Studios, filled with rich storytelling and challenging quests in a Dungeons & Dragons universe.

title: League of Legends
desc: Join the battle in the world's most popular multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game from Riot Games, where strategy and teamwork are essential for victory.
